training_plans.target_audience: Title IV-E agency staff, local prevention service providers, community partners, tribal agencies, probation, supervisors, managers, directors
Caseworkers, supervisors, intake, admin, fiscal staff, tribal agencies, community pathway providers
Practitioners, Title IV-E agencies, CBOs, local agency leadership
Contracted EBP providers, local service providers

ongoing_support.description: Supervisors monitor caseloads and performance of caseworkers; ongoing assessment of family needs and service fidelity; periodic risk assessments and safety monitoring required for all prevention cases.

ongoing_support.type: Continuous Quality Improvement (CQI) and technical assistance
ongoing_support.description: CQI protocols include regular assessment of service delivery, fidelity monitoring, technical assistance, and periodic reviews to ensure fidelity to EBP models.
